category_name: Personal Data Revealing Racial or Ethnic Origin
category_description: Personal data that reveals or is used to infer a consumer's racial or ethnic origin
processing_restrictions: Requires opt-in consent; Purpose limitation strictly enforced; Cannot be used for discriminatory purposes
security_requirements: Encryption at rest and in transit; Access controls with audit logging; Role-based access; Data minimization required

category_description: Personal data that reveals or is used to infer a consumer's religious beliefs or affiliations
processing_restrictions: Requires opt-in consent; Cannot be used for discriminatory purposes or targeting; Purpose limitation strictly enforced
security_requirements: Encryption at rest and in transit; Access controls with audit logging; Need-to-know basis access only

category_name: Personal Data Revealing Mental or Physical Health Diagnosis
category_description: Personal data revealing a consumer's mental or physical health diagnosis; treatment; or condition including pregnancy
processing_restrictions: Requires opt-in consent; HIPAA alignment recommended; Purpose limitation strictly enforced; Cannot be disclosed without authorization
security_requirements: Encryption at rest and in transit; Access controls; Audit logging; HIPAA-compliant security measures where applicable

category_name: Personal Data Revealing Sex Life or Sexual Orientation
category_description: Personal data that reveals or is used to infer a consumer's sex life or sexual orientation
processing_restrictions: Requires opt-in consent; Cannot be used for discriminatory purposes; Enhanced protection required; Purpose limitation strictly enforced
security_requirements: Encryption with enhanced protection; Restricted access with audit logging; Segregated storage recommended

category_name: Personal Data Revealing Citizenship or Immigration Status
category_description: Personal data that reveals or is used to infer a consumer's citizenship status or immigration status
processing_restrictions: Requires opt-in consent; Cannot be disclosed to immigration authorities without legal process; Enhanced protection required
security_requirements: Encryption at rest and in transit; Restricted access; Audit logging; Segregated storage; Legal review required for disclosures

category_description: Genetic data processed for the purpose of uniquely identifying an individual including DNA sequencing; genetic heritage information; hereditary disease markers
processing_restrictions: Requires opt-in consent; Cannot be disclosed without explicit authorization; GINA compliance required; State genetic privacy law alignment required; Enhanced purpose limitation
security_requirements: Biometric-grade encryption; Restricted access with multi-factor authentication; Segregated storage; Tamper-evident audit logs; Annual security assessments

category_description: Biometric data processed for purpose of uniquely identifying a consumer including fingerprints; facial recognition templates; iris scans; voice prints; gait analysis
processing_restrictions: Requires opt-in consent; Must be deleted upon consumer request or when purpose ends; Cannot be sold; Enhanced security required; Illinois BIPA considerations
security_requirements: Biometric-grade encryption; Secure enclave storage; Multi-factor authentication; Role-based access; Tamper-evident audit logs

category_description: Precise geolocation data derived from device tracking within 1750 feet radius revealing consumer's physical location or movements
processing_restrictions: Requires opt-in consent; Must clearly disclose tracking purposes; Can be used for navigation with consent; Enhanced deletion rights; Purpose limitation
security_requirements: Encryption at rest and in transit; Access controls; Audit logging; Anonymization when aggregated

category_description: Personal data processed with actual knowledge that the data are from a child under 13 years of age
processing_restrictions: Requires verifiable parental consent; COPPA compliance required; Enhanced deletion rights; Cannot be used for targeted advertising; Data minimization strictly required; Purpose limitation
security_requirements: Enhanced encryption; Restricted access; Parental oversight mechanisms; Audit logging; Age verification safeguards

category_name: Social Security Numbers and Government IDs
category_description: Social Security numbers; driver's license numbers; state identification card numbers; passport numbers; or other government-issued identification numbers
processing_restrictions: Requires opt-in consent; Strict purpose limitation (identity verification; fraud prevention; legal compliance only); Enhanced retention limits; Deletion required when purpose ends
security_requirements: Encryption at rest and in transit; Tokenization recommended; Multi-factor authentication; Segregated storage; Audit logging; PCI-DSS alignment where applicable
